name: Super Tank Rumble
summary:
Super Tank Rumble is a sandbox strategy game where a player assembles their tank with various Blocks and plays 1 vs 1 against other user-built tanks.
If a player destroys the other player’s tank, the player wins the battle.
Increasing the player’s level by winning battles unlocks new Blocks to use for their tanks. Opening Supply Boxes rewards the player with Research Documents that can be used to upgrade Blocks or to unlock new Blocks. As a player wins more battles their ranking will rise, allowing them to climb to the top of the ladder and become a legendary tank captain.
A player can also make Blueprints of their original tank creations and share them with other players to download and use. They can show them off on social media as well.
